link.title: Check 'Humans need not apply' on youtube

slides.text: Why is JavaScript the english of programming languages?

link.title: See how JavaScript has the fastest growing ecosystem in human history

slides.text: Go and create your E-mail account. BUT: if you already have one, just continue
We use the chrome browser and chrome dev tools in later lessons, so check if you have it

link.title: Create chrome profile & sign in with your browser

slides.text: SignUp to Github - the largest social network for programmers. (NOTE: check your browsers address bar to allow the signup popup for wizardamigos signup)
To join our open chat, you need to signup to gitter (with your github account)

link.title: Sigin to gitter (with your github account)

slides.text: Download the gitter mobile app (and activate NOTIFICATIONS on both)

NEXT: (1.) learn how to manage your knowledge, THEN: (2.) learn all javascript basics, THEN: (3.) build you first webpage, THEN: (4.) build your first webapp, FINALLY: (5.) turn your webapp into a iphone mobile app
